reviews.review: makes me want to end it all

This game is actually good, i though the CS:GO community its the worst but not thats the actually,but the dbd. So abuse liar in-game provocation. Outgame. Only thing is wrong about that you cant turn off the (steam) How they come with they lies,abusing,provocation. And lets just do not talk about the cheaters,bc even if you mention it to devs,they arent going to bann hax users,but you for even telling it. Also i havent even problem with it if they werent just provocate it.

Unfortunately, the current state of the game with it's countless subtle cheaters and blatant hackers the game is no longer worth playing. If you play well, your MMR will increase, and a large number of cheaters are in high MMR. I've been queued with cheaters several games in a row, and it's just not worth your time.
If you like getting jumpscared, then yeah this game is for you.

just saw i have played this for 420 hours...what a great opportunity to review this game. 
Do I recommend it? Yes. 
Do I think it is astronomically flawed in many ways? Yes. 
Do I plan to continue playing it despite this? Also yes. 

All jokes aside, you are going to hear some pretty conflicting opinions about this game, but at the end of the day I have had a lot of fun playing it. I have met some amazing friends playing this game, and honestly despite the game's flaws I think that makes it worth it. I guess it just depends on what you value when playing your games.
Nerf Sadako at least other killer had flaws this killer is op kill after kill after kill man. Good game otherwise.
this game is so fun back in the day and today i tried to log on i have 560 hours on this game and it says i can run it now and i have a great computer dont buy

I do feel terrified from the screaming in my ears, i always play as a killer
10/10 
kekw

Don't trust Behaviour's statements. They don't care about Ukraine and current situation in there. They're just following a popular mindless trend. Instead of uselessly cancelling players from Russia and Belarus, the company could actually help Ukraine by transferring all the proceeds from these two countries to the needy population of the besieged country. Right now, the developers (like many other companies) are only fueling further discord and hostility.

Sometimes i look back on the game, but basicly the player base has the most toxic players. Console killers only know camp+tunnel, console survivers are bots. PC killers are sweatlord most of the time slug, PC survivers are more likely trolls for content and highlights. In a nut shell. The game is tag and who buy it decide the play style how they play. If it would have a healtyer playerbase i would play it more offen, but this is the reason i dont recommend the game for my friends, but try it out maybe YOU will have a different point of view. 

+: I like the bc im a horror fan and it has it what it takes. Easy to learn don't need a lot of time for a round.
-: It's grindy as hell and has a large amount of toxic+sweatlord playerbase.
very fun very good thank u

Thank you, dear Behaviors, for forbidding me to buy DLC, because I was born and raised in Russia, like many of my compatriots. I understand your desire to push "the only correct" public opinion out of Washington about the political situation, but the only thing you have achieved is hostility towards your leadership. You made nice game, but I will act as hypocritically as you do and put a dislike.
It's my first horror game and I am absolutely ~hooked~
Game crashed a few times with the new update and I'm getting penalties just for the game itself crashing and kicking me out of matches.
it's a good game just have a stronk pc that can run it

The game is fun,but the grind for it is awful with perk tiers that there are more added with each major update and playing killer a lot of times is downright masochistic with maps that are way too big for killers without good movement . But nothing comes close as bad as this game not adding replays for players,without it a lot of cheaters can get away with cheating and killer can be left locked in match forced to wait for hacker to leave or disconect themselves.
i will forever be grateful for dbd making me not sin against god, for I get no bitches no more.
